   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %%
   22: -module(ssl_alpn_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   25: 
   26: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   28: 
   29: %% Callback functions
   30: -export([all/0,
   31:          groups/0,
   32:          init_per_suite/1,
   33:          end_per_suite/1,
   34:          init_per_group/2,
   35:          end_per_group/2,
   36:          init_per_testcase/2,
   37:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   38: 
   39: %% Testcases
   40: -export([empty_protocols_are_not_allowed/1,
   41:          protocols_must_be_a_binary_list/1,
   42:          empty_client/1,
   43:          empty_server/1,
   44:          empty_client_empty_server/1,
   45:          no_matching_protocol/1,
   46:          client_alpn_and_server_alpn/1,
   47:          client_alpn_and_server_no_support/1,
   48:          client_no_support_and_server_alpn/1,
   49:          client_renegotiate/1,
   50:          session_reused/1,
   51:          client_alpn_npn_and_server_alpn_npn/1,
   52:          client_alpn_and_server_alpn_npn/1,
   53:          client_alpn_npn_and_server_alpn/1
   54:         ]).
   55: 
   56: %% Apply export
   57: 
   58: -export([assert_alpn/2,
   59:          assert_alpn_and_renegotiate_and_send_data/3,
   60:          ssl_send_and_assert_alpn/3,
   61:          ssl_receive_and_assert_alpn/3,
   62:          ssl_send/2,
   63:          ssl_receive/2,
   64:          connection_info_result/1
   65:         ]).
   66: 
   67: -define(SLEEP, 500).
   68: 
   69: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   70: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   71: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   72: 
   73: all() ->
   74:     [
   75:      {group, 'tlsv1.3'},
   76:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   77:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   78:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
   79:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
   80:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
   81:     ].
   82: 
   83: groups() ->
   84:     [
   85:      {'tlsv1.3', [], alpn_tests() -- [client_renegotiate, session_reused]},
   86:      {'tlsv1.2', [], alpn_tests() ++ alpn_npn_coexist()},
   87:      {'tlsv1.1', [], alpn_tests() ++ alpn_npn_coexist()},
   88:      {'tlsv1', [], alpn_tests() ++ alpn_npn_coexist()},
   89:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], alpn_tests() ++ alpn_npn_coexist()},
   90:      {'dtlsv1', [], alpn_tests() ++ alpn_npn_coexist()}
   91:     ].
   92: 
   93: alpn_tests() ->
   94:     [empty_protocols_are_not_allowed,
   95:      protocols_must_be_a_binary_list,
   96:      empty_client,
   97:      empty_server,
   98:      empty_client_empty_server,
   99:      no_matching_protocol,
  100:      client_alpn_and_server_alpn,
  101:      client_alpn_and_server_no_support,
  102:      client_no_support_and_server_alpn,
  103:      client_renegotiate,
  104:      session_reused
  105:     ].
  106: 
  107: alpn_npn_coexist() ->
  108:     [
  109:      client_alpn_npn_and_server_alpn_npn,
  110:      client_alpn_and_server_alpn_npn,
  111:      client_alpn_npn_and_server_alpn
  112:     ].
  113: 
  114: 
  115: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  116:     catch crypto:stop(),
  117:     try crypto:start() of
  118: 	ok ->
  119: 	    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  120: 	    ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0)
  121:     catch _:_ ->
  122: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  123:     end.
  124: 
  125: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  126:     ssl:stop(),
  127:     application:unload(ssl),
  128:     application:stop(crypto).
  129: 
  130: 
  131: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  132:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, Config). 
  133: 
  134: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  135:   ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  136: 
  137: 
  138: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  139:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  140:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  141:     Config.
  142: 
  143: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->     
  144:     Config.
  145: 
  146: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  147: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  148: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  149: 
  150: empty_protocols_are_not_allowed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  151:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  152:     {error, {options, {alpn_preferred_protocols, {invalid_protocol, <<>>}}}}
  153: 	= (catch ssl:listen(9443,
  154: 			    [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"foo/1">>, <<"">>]}| ServerOpts])),
  155:     {error, {options, {alpn_advertised_protocols, {invalid_protocol, <<>>}}}}
  156: 	= (catch ssl:connect({127,0,0,1}, 9443,
  157: 			     [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"foo/1">>, <<"">>]} | ServerOpts])).
  158: 
  159: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  160: 
  161: protocols_must_be_a_binary_list(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  162:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  163:     Option1 = {alpn_preferred_protocols, hello},
  164:     {error, {options, Option1}} = (catch ssl:listen(9443, [Option1 | ServerOpts])),
  165:     Option2 = {alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"foo/1">>, hello]},
  166:     {error, {options, {alpn_preferred_protocols, {invalid_protocol, hello}}}}
  167:         = (catch ssl:listen(9443, [Option2 | ServerOpts])),
  168:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  169:     Option3 = {alpn_advertised_protocols, hello},
  170:     {error, {options, Option3}} = (catch ssl:connect({127,0,0,1}, 9443, [Option3 | ClientOpts])),
  171:     Option4 = {alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"foo/1">>, hello]},
  172:     {error, {options, {alpn_advertised_protocols, {invalid_protocol, hello}}}}
  173:         = (catch ssl:connect({127,0,0,1}, 9443, [Option4 | ClientOpts])).
  174: 
  175: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  176: 
  177: empty_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  178:     run_failing_handshake(Config,
  179:                           [{alpn_advertised_protocols, []}],
  180:                           [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"spdy/3">>, <<"http/2">>]}],
  181:                           no_application_protocol).
  182: 
  183: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  184: 
  185: empty_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  186:     run_failing_handshake(Config,
  187:                           [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"http/1.0">>, <<"http/1.1">>]}],
  188:                           [{alpn_preferred_protocols, []}],
  189:                           no_application_protocol).
  190: 
  191: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  192: 
  193: empty_client_empty_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  194:     run_failing_handshake(Config,
  195:                           [{alpn_advertised_protocols, []}],
  196:                           [{alpn_preferred_protocols, []}],
  197:                           no_application_protocol).
  198: 
  199: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  200: 
  201: no_matching_protocol(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  202:     run_failing_handshake(Config,
  203:                           [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"http/1.0">>, <<"http/1.1">>]}],
  204:                           [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"spdy/3">>, <<"http/2">>]}],
  205:                           no_application_protocol).
  206: 
  207: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  208: 
  209: client_alpn_and_server_alpn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  210:     run_handshake(Config,
  211:                   [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"http/1.0">>, <<"http/1.1">>]}],
  212:                   [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.1">>, <<"http/1.0">>]}],
  213:                   {ok, <<"http/1.1">>}).
  214: 
  215: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  216: 
  217: client_alpn_and_server_no_support(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  218:     run_handshake(Config,
  219: 		    [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"http/1.0">>, <<"http/1.1">>]}],
  220: 		    [],
  221: 		    {error, protocol_not_negotiated}).
  222: 
  223: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  224: 
  225: client_no_support_and_server_alpn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  226:     run_handshake(Config,
  227: 		    [],
  228: 		    [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.1">>, <<"http/1.0">>]}],
  229: 		    {error, protocol_not_negotiated}).
  230: 
  231: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  232: 
  233: client_alpn_npn_and_server_alpn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  234:     run_handshake(Config,
  235: 		    [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"http/1.0">>, <<"http/1.1">>]},
  236: 		        {client_preferred_next_protocols, {client, [<<"spdy/2">>], <<"spdy/3">>}}],
  237: 		    [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.1">>, <<"http/1.0">>]}],
  238: 		    {ok, <<"http/1.1">>}).
  239: 
  240: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  241: 
  242: client_alpn_npn_and_server_alpn_npn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  243:     run_handshake(Config,
  244: 		    [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"http/1.0">>, <<"http/1.1">>]},
  245: 		        {client_preferred_next_protocols, {client, [<<"spdy/2">>], <<"spdy/3">>}}],
  246: 		    [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.1">>, <<"http/1.0">>]},
  247: 		        {next_protocols_advertised, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.0">>]}],
  248: 		    {ok, <<"http/1.1">>}).
  249: 
  250: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  251: 
  252: client_alpn_and_server_alpn_npn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  253:     run_handshake(Config,
  254: 		    [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"http/1.0">>, <<"http/1.1">>]}],
  255: 		    [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.1">>, <<"http/1.0">>]},
  256: 		        {next_protocols_advertised, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.0">>]}],
  257: 		    {ok, <<"http/1.1">>}).
  258: 
  259: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  260: 
  261: client_renegotiate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  262:     Data = "hello world",
  263:     
  264:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  265:     ClientOpts = [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"http/1.0">>]}] ++ ClientOpts0,
  266:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  267:     ServerOpts = [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.1">>, <<"http/1.0">>]}] ++  ServerOpts0,
  268:     ExpectedProtocol = {ok, <<"http/1.0">>},
  269: 
  270:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  271:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  272:                     {from, self()},
  273:                     {mfa, {?MODULE, ssl_receive_and_assert_alpn, [ExpectedProtocol, Data]}},
  274:                     {options, ServerOpts}]),
  275: 
  276:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  277:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  278:                {host, Hostname},
  279:                {from, self()},
  280:                {mfa, {?MODULE, assert_alpn_and_renegotiate_and_send_data, [ExpectedProtocol, Data]}},
  281:                {options, ClientOpts}]),
  282: 
  283:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
  284: 
  285: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  286: 
  287: session_reused(Config) when  is_list(Config)->
  288:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  289:     ClientOpts = [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"http/1.0">>]}] ++ ClientOpts0,
  290:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  291:     ServerOpts = [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.1">>, <<"http/1.0">>]}] ++  ServerOpts0,
  292: 
  293:     ssl_test_lib:reuse_session(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  294: 
  295: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  296: %% callback functions ------------------------------------------------
  297: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  298: 
  299: assert_alpn(Socket, Protocol) ->
  300:     ?CT_LOG("Negotiated Protocol ~p, Expecting: ~p ~n",
  301: 		       [ssl:negotiated_protocol(Socket), Protocol]),
  302:     Protocol = ssl:negotiated_protocol(Socket).
  303: 
  304: assert_alpn_and_renegotiate_and_send_data(Socket, Protocol, Data) ->
  305:     assert_alpn(Socket, Protocol),
  306:     ?CT_LOG("Renegotiating ~n", []),
  307:     ok = ssl:renegotiate(Socket),
  308:     ssl:send(Socket, Data),
  309:     assert_alpn(Socket, Protocol),
  310:     ok.
  311: 
  312: ssl_send_and_assert_alpn(Socket, Protocol, Data) ->
  313:     assert_alpn(Socket, Protocol),
  314:     ssl_send(Socket, Data).
  315: 
  316: ssl_receive_and_assert_alpn(Socket, Protocol, Data) ->
  317:     assert_alpn(Socket, Protocol),
  318:     ssl_receive(Socket, Data).
  319: 
  320: ssl_send(Socket, Data) ->
  321:     ?CT_LOG("Connection info: ~p~n",
  322:                [ssl:connection_information(Socket)]),
  323:     ssl:send(Socket, Data).
  324: 
  325: ssl_receive(Socket, Data) ->
  326:     ssl_receive(Socket, Data, []).
  327: 
  328: ssl_receive(Socket, Data, Buffer) ->
  329:     ?CT_LOG("Connection info: ~p~n",
  330:            [ssl:connection_information(Socket)]),
  331:     receive
  332:     {ssl, Socket, MoreData} ->
  333:         ?CT_LOG("Received ~p~n",[MoreData]),
  334:         NewBuffer = Buffer ++ MoreData,
  335:         case NewBuffer of
  336:             Data ->
  337:                 ssl:send(Socket, "Got it"),
  338:                 ok;
  339:             _ ->
  340:                 ssl_receive(Socket, Data, NewBuffer)
  341:         end;
  342:     Other ->
  343:         ct:fail({unexpected_message, Other})
  344:     after 4000 ->
  345:         ct:fail({did_not_get, Data})
  346:     end.
  347: 
  348: connection_info_result(Socket) ->
  349:     ssl:connection_information(Socket).
  350: 
  351: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  352: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
  353: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  354: 
  355: run_failing_handshake(Config, ClientExtraOpts, ServerExtraOpts, ExpectedAlert) ->
  356:     ClientOpts = ClientExtraOpts ++ ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  357:     ServerOpts = ServerExtraOpts ++ ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  358: 
  359:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  360:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  361:                     {from, self()},
  362:                     {mfa, {?MODULE, placeholder, []}},
  363:                     {options, ServerOpts}]),
  364: 
  365:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  366:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  367:                                            {host, Hostname},
  368:                                            {from, self()},
  369:                                            {mfa, {?MODULE, placeholder, []}},
  370:                                            {options, ClientOpts}]),
  371:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, ExpectedAlert).
  372: 
  373: run_handshake(Config, ClientExtraOpts, ServerExtraOpts, ExpectedProtocol) ->
  374:     Data = "hello world",
  375: 
  376:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  377:     ClientOpts = ClientExtraOpts ++ ClientOpts0,
  378:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  379:     ServerOpts = ServerExtraOpts ++  ServerOpts0,
  380: 
  381:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  382:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  383:                     {from, self()},
  384:                     {mfa, {?MODULE, ssl_receive_and_assert_alpn, [ExpectedProtocol, Data]}},
  385:                     {options, ServerOpts}]),
  386: 
  387:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  388:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  389:                {host, Hostname},
  390:                {from, self()},
  391:                {mfa, {?MODULE, ssl_send_and_assert_alpn, [ExpectedProtocol, Data]}},
  392:                {options, ClientOpts}]),
  393: 
  394:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
